meta.description: Optimize meal planning to meet nutritional needs at minimum cost.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per serving of each food.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content per serving of each food.

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content per serving of each food.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per serving of each food.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the selected food servings.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 60 grams of protein.

constraints.name: carbohydrate_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 146 grams of carbohydrates.

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
